00001 package de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.resolver;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
00005 import java.lang.reflect.Field;
00006 import java.net.URL;
00007 import java.util.Properties;
00008 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00009 
00010 import org.w3c.dom.ls.LSInput;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.ls.LSResourceResolver;
00012 import org.xml.sax.EntityResolver;
00013 import org.xml.sax.InputSource;
00014 import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
00021 public class Resolver implements LSResourceResolver, EntityResolver {
00022   
00023   private static Logger log = Logger.getLogger(Resolver.class.toString());
00024   
00025   private Properties prop;
00026   
00027   private Input input = new Input();
00028   
00032   public Resolver(){
00033     log.config("Initialize new ResourceResolver!");
00034     prop = new Properties();
00035     try {
00036       prop.loadFromXML(getClass().getResourceAsStream("/config/BioDOM.properties.xml"));
00037     } catch (IOException e){
00038       log.warning("loading of BioDOM.properties.xml failed!");
00039     }
00040     
00041   }
00042   
00043   /*
00044    *  (non-Javadoc)
00045    * @see org.w3c.dom.ls.LSResourceResolver#resolveResource(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00046    */
00047   public LSInput resolveResource(String type,
00048       String namespaceURI,
00049       String publicId,
00050       String systemId,
00051       String baseURI) {
00052     log.finest("resolveResource(type->"+type+",namespaceURI->"+namespaceURI+",publicId->"+publicId+",systemId->"+systemId+",baseURI->"+baseURI);
00053     // check if namespaceURI is located in local resource
00054     String propkey = "BioDOM.nslocation.jar."+namespaceURI; 
00055     String nslocation = prop.getProperty(propkey);
00056     if (nslocation != null) {
00057       input.setByteStream(getClass().getResourceAsStream(nslocation));
00058       log.finest("Resolver return value is: "+input.toString());
00059       return input;
00060     }
00061     log.config("Property "+propkey+" not found in BioDOM.properties.xml - Trying external version...");
00062     propkey = "BioDOM.nslocation.remote."+namespaceURI;
00063     nslocation = prop.getProperty(propkey);
00064     try {
00065       EntityResolver externalresolver = getCatalogResolver();
00066       if (nslocation != null) {
00067         input.fromInputSource(externalresolver.resolveEntity(null, nslocation));
00068       } else {
00069         input.fromInputSource(externalresolver.resolveEntity(publicId, systemId));
00070       }
00071       log.finest("Resolver return value is: "+input.toString());
00072       return input;
00073     } catch (Exception e) {
00074       log.config("No external resolver found: "+e.getMessage());
00075     }
00076     // in case of no external Catalogresolver, return external nslocation from properties as InputStream
00077     try {
00078       if (nslocation != null) {
00079         input.setByteStream(new URL(nslocation).openStream());
00080         log.finest("Resolver return value is: "+input.toString());
00081         return input;
00082       } 
00083     } catch (Exception e) {
00084       log.config("Could not open external resource Stream: "+e.getMessage());
00085     }
00086     log.config("Couldn't resolve namespace/namespace location. If you see this, you should think about downloading the full biodom archive, which contains all necessary schemas!");
00087     log.finest("Resolver return value is 'null'");
00088     return null;
00089   }
00090     
00091     /*
00092      *  (non-Javadoc)
00093      * @see org.xml.sax.EntityResolver#resolveEntity(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00094      */
00095     public InputSource resolveEntity(String publicId, String systemId) throws SAXException, IOException {
00096         if (prop.containsValue(systemId)) {
00097             log.info("found systemId ["+systemId+"]in Properties");
00098             for (Object key : prop.keySet()) {
00099                 if (prop.get(key).equals(systemId)) {
00100                     String NS = ((String)key).replaceFirst("BioDOM.nslocation.remote.","");
00101                     return new InputSource(resolveResource(null,NS,publicId,systemId,null).getByteStream());
00102                 }
00103             }
00104         } 
00105         // FIXME : add external EntityResolver
00106         return null;
00107     }
00108   
00116   private EntityResolver getCatalogResolver() throws Exception{
00117     Class cm =  Class.forName("org.apache.xml.resolver.CatalogManager");
00118     Object cm_o = cm.newInstance();
00119     
00120     Class cr =  Class.forName("org.apache.xml.resolver.tools.CatalogResolver");
00121     Constructor c = cr.getConstructor(cm);
00122     Field namespaceAware = cr.getField("namespaceAware");
00123     Field validating = cr.getField("validating");
00124     Object cr_o = c.newInstance(cm_o);
00125     namespaceAware.setBoolean(cr_o,true);
00126     validating.setBoolean(cr_o,true);
00127     return (EntityResolver)cm_o;          
00128   }
00129 }
